nl.inl.blacklab.search.results

Class SampleParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.inl.blacklab.search.results.SampleParameters

  • public class SampleParameters
extends Object
    Parameters that determine how much to sample and whether to use a fixed seed.

    • Method Summary

                                           long seedValueSet)

        public static SampleParameters fixedNumber(int numberOfHitsSet)

      • seed

        public long seed()
        Get the seed for the sample operation. This may either be a fixed seed set by the user, or a randomly chosen seed. However, for an existing instance of SampleParameters, the seed won't ever change.
        Returns:
        seed

      • numberOfHits

        public int numberOfHits(int totalNumberOfHits)
        Get number of hits to sample, given total number of hits. Always valid, regardless of isPercentage() setting.
        Parameters:
        totalNumberOfHits - the total number of hits
        Returns:
        number to sample

      • isPercentage

        public boolean isPercentage()
        Is this a relative sample amount? If true, percentage() return the percentage of hits to sample. If false, number() returns the absolute number of hits to sample.
        Returns:
        true if this is relative, false if not

      • percentageOfHits

        public double percentageOfHits()
        Get percentage of hits to sample. Only valid if isRelative() return true.
        Returns:
        desired percentage

      • numberOfHitsSet

        public int numberOfHitsSet()
        Get number of hits to sample. Only valid if isRelative() return false.
        Returns:
        desired number

      • isFixedSeed

        public boolean isFixedSeed()
        Was a fixed seed set? If not, a random seed was chosen. In either case, call seed() to get the seed used. The return value will not change for an instance of SampleParameters.
        Returns:
        true if a fixed seed value was set, false if it wasn't

        public String toString()
